insert into tour(tour_no, tour_type, tour_name, tour_postal, tour_addr, tour_hp) select nextval('tour_seq'), A.* from(
select #{item.tour_type, jdbcType=NUMERIC} as tour_type, #{item.tour_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR} as tour_name, #{item.tour_postal, jdbcType=VARCHAR} as tour_postal, #{item.tour_addr, jdbcType=VARCHAR} as tour_addr, #{item.tour_hp, jdbcType=VARCHAR} as tour_hp from dual ) A
